solution: We have $AB+BD=30\text{ cm}$, $BD+DE=20\text{ cm}$, and $AB+BD+DE=40\text{ cm}$.  Summing the first two equations and subtracting the third gives $BD=30\text{ cm}+20\text{ cm}-40\text{ cm}=10$ cm.  Therefore, $BC=BD/2=5\text{ cm}$, $AB=AD-BD=20\text{ cm}$, and $AC=AB+BC=5\text{ cm}+20\text{ cm}=\boxed{25}\text{ cm}$.
